topic.title: Major Lazer x DJ Snake feat. MØ - Lean On [Flac]
topic.body:
"Lean On" is a 2015 song by Major Lazer (a music project created by American DJ and record producer Diplo) and French DJ and producer DJ Snake. The song features vocals by Danish recording artist MØ

Very hight quality of sound.

topic.title: Kyary Pamyu Pamyu [Flac]
topic.body: 3 CD of the Japanese singer Kyary Pamyu Pamyu. The Hit in those CD are: 02. PON PON PON and 04. つけまつける (Tsukema Tsukeru) from CD1
